text:
I get an error saying context is read only when I try to bind a datasource
object to java:comp/env/jdbc
creator: sammailus@yahoo.com

text:
That's normal, the JNDI ENC is read only from the application side. To modify 
it, you have to edit server.xml and add some resources using it.
See the JNDI Resource HOWTO for the full documentation.
creator: remm@apache.org
